snippet: Seattle will find it difficult but not impossible to keep its home playoff winning streak alive against Green Bay, thanks in part to CenturyLink Field.
abstract: NFL preview of NFC Championship matchup between Seattle Seahawks and Green Bay Packers.
lead_paragraph: Seattle will find it difficult but not impossible to keep its home playoff winning streak alive against Green Bay, thanks in part to CenturyLink Field.

headline.main: Green Bay Packers at Seattle Seahawks: N.F.C. Championship Preview
headline.print_headline: Green Bay Packers at Seattle Seahawks: N.F.C. Championship Matchup
